text: Sauze d'Oulx is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin in the Piedmont region in northern Italy. It was the site of the freestyle skiing events of the 2006 Olympic Winter Games. Together with the villages of Pragelato, Sestriere, Claviere, Cesana Torinese, San Sicario and Montgen√®vre, in France which makes up the Via Lattea (Milky Way) skiing area. == References == Category:Comunes of Turin
title: Sauze d'Oulx
